content.raw: did you consider using shared pointers to manage ownership of the bullet objects?

content.raw:
The new sdf/FinalizeModels feature needs some documentation. It looks like the feature is based on the `finalizeMultiDof` function in bullet that was added in the following PR:

* https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3/pull/337/files#diff-310d1cfc127b12e6cc3b0d510dba7b60

I'm guessing this is a function that needs to be called after all sdf Construct functions have been called and before a btMultiBody model can be used?
content.html:
The new sdf/FinalizeModels feature needs some documentation. It looks like the feature is based on the finalizeMultiDof function in bullet that was added in the following PR:

  • https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3/pull/337/files#diff-310d1cfc127b12e6cc3b0d510dba7b60

I'm guessing this is a function that needs to be called after all sdf Construct functions have been called and before a btMultiBody model can be used?

update.description:
Implement Bullet plugin for physics simulation.

Requires [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/403](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/403).

It breaks API/ABI, so it is targeted at `default`.

Current features support running `shapes.sdf` and `world_joint.sdf`.

‌

Note:

1\. Current implementation is not optimized for efficiency yet.

2\. Tests not yet added.
update.title: [WIP] Add Bullet physics engine

content.raw: I would move the implementation to SDFFeatures.cc for consistency
content.html: I would move the implementation to SDFFeatures.cc for consistency

content.raw: OK! I will decline this one and reopen another targeting `ign-physics1`.
content.html: OK! I will decline this one and reopen another targeting ign-physics1.

content.raw: that header file is in the `src` folder and is not installed, so it's ok to make changes to it
content.html: that header file is in the src folder and is not installed, so it's ok to make changes to it

content.raw: I have one change to [dartsim/src/SDFFeatures.hh](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/pull-requests/97/wip-add-bullet-physics-engine/diff#chg-dartsim/src/SDFFeatures.hh). Is that okay?
content.html: I have one change to dartsim/src/SDFFeatures.hh. Is that okay?

content.raw:
I don't think this breaks API/ABI since it doesn't change any installed headers; it does add a new header, but I don't think that's a breaking change

so I think this could be targeted at ign-physics1
content.html:
I don't think this breaks API/ABI since it doesn't change any installed headers; it does add a new header, but I don't think that's a breaking change

so I think this could be targeted at ign-physics1

content.raw:
bullet versions in Ubuntu repos:

```
 bullet | 2.81-rev2613+dfsg2-1 | trusty/universe | source
 bullet | 2.83.6+dfsg-3        | xenial/universe | source
 bullet | 2.87+dfsg-2          | bionic/universe | source
 bullet | 2.87+dfsg-2          | cosmic/universe | source
 bullet | 2.87+dfsg-3          | disco/universe  | source
 bullet | 2.87+dfsg-3          | eoan/universe   | source
```

same for Debian. Is the 2.88 version required for some particular reason or can we relax the requirement here?
content.html:
bullet versions in Ubuntu repos:

 bullet | 2.81-rev2613+dfsg2-1 | trusty/universe | source
 bullet | 2.83.6+dfsg-3        | xenial/universe | source
 bullet | 2.87+dfsg-2          | bionic/universe | source
 bullet | 2.87+dfsg-2          | cosmic/universe | source
 bullet | 2.87+dfsg-3          | disco/universe  | source
 bullet | 2.87+dfsg-3          | eoan/universe   | source

same for Debian. Is the 2.88 version required for some particular reason or can we relax the requirement here?
